name: Spellcasting (Non-Cantrip)
description: Casting spells above cantrip level, requiring spell slot expenditure
prerequisites: Available spell slot of appropriate level
Verbal components (ability to speak if required)

srdReferences.quote: Casting a spell other than a cantrip

srdReferences.context: Any spell casting interrupts Short Rest
Individual spell descriptions define casting time, components, and effects

castingTimeCategories.reaction: Spells cast in response to triggers (e.g., Shield, Counterspell)
castingTimeCategories.minutes: Ritual spells and longer casting times (1-10 minutes)

spellSlotRecovery.arcaneRecovery: Wizard can recover slots once per day during short rest

examples: Using Detect Magic to investigate an object
Casting Invisibility before sneaking past guards
Performing Identify ritual on a magic item
Casting Sending to communicate over long distance
exceptions: Cantrips do NOT interrupt Short Rest (only non-cantrip spells)
Ritual casting extends casting time by 10 minutes but doesn't consume slot
Some features allow spell recovery without rest (e.g., Arcane Recovery)
